data.title: Watch Mortal Passions
data.meta_description: Watch Mortal Passions Online. Mortal Passions the  Movie, Trailers, Videos and more at Yidio.
data.text:
Mortal Passions is a thriller movie released in 1989, directed by Andrew Lane, and stars Zach Galligan, Krista Errickson, and Michael Bowen. The movie follows the life of Eddie Collins (Zach Galligan), a young man who inherits the family business, a struggling amusement park. Eddie plans to revamp the park to attract more customers in hope of making it profitable again.

As Eddie works on the redevelopment of the amusement park, he meets the seductive Nicole Durant (Krista Errickson), who becomes his muse and inspiration for the park. Nicole's husband, Jake (Michael Bowen), is a local detective who starts to investigate the increasing murders around the park. Eddie and Nicole's relationship heats up, and together they try to solve the mystery of the killings that occur each night in the park.

The movie is a blend of murder mystery, erotism, and suspense. It is not recommended for kids as it features scenes of violence, sexual content, and drug use. The film's storyline intricately interweaves the personal lives of the characters with the murder mystery, creating a perfect blend of thrill and drama.

Zach Galligan's character, Eddie Collins, is portrayed as an idealistic but naÃ¯ve young man who is passionate about the amusement park and its redevelopment. He is also the perfect target for Nicole, who knows how to manipulate him. Nicole Durant, played by Krista Errickson, is a femme fatale who uses her seductive wiles to gain control over Eddie. She is a critical character in the movie, and her actions drive the story forward.

Michael Bowen, who plays Jake Durant, is a seasoned detective who is on the case of finding the murderer. He is suspicious of Nicole and her involvement in the killings. As he investigates, he uncovers a series of twisted events that ultimately lead to a shocking discovery.

The music in the movie is another highlight, with a score composed by Christopher L. Stone. The soundtrack is a mix of electronic and orchestral music that creates a dark and ominous atmosphere.

The cinematography is excellent, with the amusement park being used as the perfect backdrop for the story's unfolding events. The lighting and camera angles used throughout the movie are also top-notch, effectively creating an eerie ambiance that adds to the thrilling atmosphere.

In conclusion, Mortal Passions is a potboiler thriller with a perfect blend of suspense, sexuality, and drama. The film showcases the talents of young Zach Galligan and Krista Errickson, who deliver solid performances, along with Michael Bowen, who plays an excellent detective. The cinematography and music are also impressive, making this movie a must-see for fans of the genre.

Mortal Passions is a 1989 drama with a runtime of 1 hour and 35 minutes. It has received mostly poor reviews from critics and viewers, who have given it an IMDb score of 4.5.
